revised_title: Immunological Taxonomy of Species within the Genus Solanum
tldr: The authors applied immunological methods, specifically gel-diffusion techniques, to study the relationships between species within the genus Solanum, particularly focusing on Mexican potato species. They found that these methods provided results that closely aligned with classical taxonomic methods and cytological/genetic studies. This research highlights the potential value and limitations of immunological techniques in plant taxonomy.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
